channel.title: Logging On server After Some updates
channel.description:
ok. I have updated a few things fine. they work. But! sometimes when i try to lgo on the runescape java area turns black and says loading please wait. The buttons and inventory works and i can type but screen stays black. Please help orelse ill have to do a whole lote of coding again even after the backup.
EDIT- It ALWAYS Has this problem now!

item.title: Logging On server After Some updates
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

no its fine. i got on w\ new char for a lil then wouldnt let me on after i logged out
.
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 02:49:35 PM[/size][hr]ComeOn!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 04:23:46 PM[/size][hr]shit still need help arrg i still havent fixed it.

Somebody elses and i still need help. i have backuips and after i remove what i added it still does it. this server has taken me weeks so comeon down and help me save it.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 01:43:04 PM[/size][hr]It Says this when running server and in the loading screen

ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2153 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2154 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2155 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2156 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2157 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2158 ClientHandler: Accepted from local host:2159

It goes farther than just those few numbers.
